title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer currently generates and saves an absolute path instead of a relative path. This causes issues when the report design is stored in a different location than originally set up.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located in $project/test, the included library path should be stored relative to that location.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the included library path is stored as an absolute path instead of a relative path.
